amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments numbered 5, 6 as modified, 7, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 19, 20, 21, 22, 24, 25, and 26 contained in House Report 107-62 and which are printed on pages H2224-2229 in the Congressional Record for May 16, 2001.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 5, 6 as modified, 7, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 19, 20, 21, 22, 24, 25, and 26 printed in House Report 107-62.

action.text: Hyde amendment (A005) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Hyde amendments (A005) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
